document.webtitle: Pumps to deliver more than just gas - CNN
document.description: Fill 'er up may take on a new meaning ... downloading a coupon for a free cup of coffee from the receipt ... includes a convenience store and a fast food restaurant.
document.body:
Pumps to deliver more than just gas
